benchmark_details.name: TVSum-Caption and SumMe-Caption
benchmark_details.overview: The TVSum-Caption and SumMe-Caption datasets are derived from the TVSum and SumMe datasets, designed for weakly-supervised fine-tuning and testing of video summarization models by providing dense video captions.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To support the further research of caption-based video summarization.

data.source: Derived from the TVSum and SumMe datasets, with annotations provided by multiple annotators.
data.annotation: Annotated by 5 annotators, combined under supervision.

methodology.calculation: Measured by F1 Score comparing generated summaries to ground-truth annotations.
methodology.interpretation: Higher F1 Scores indicate better summarization performance.
methodology.validation: Performance verified through extensive experiments on related datasets.
